meanings.definition: To put on a list of people or things that are disapproved of or are to be avoided.
meanings.sent1: She backlisted the unreliable supplier from future contracts.
meanings.sent2: The company backlisted any products that did not meet safety standards.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat backlisted the noisy toy to the bottom of the toy box.
meanings.sent4: His negative behavior backlisted him from the group of trusted friends.
meanings.sent5: The teacher backlisted cheating students to maintain a fair learning environment.

meanings.definition: A list of people or things that are disapproved of or are to be avoided.
meanings.sent1: The school had a backlisted of banned books in the library.
meanings.sent2: She checked the backlisted before making any purchases online.
meanings.sent3: The backlisted of dangerous chemicals was kept under lock and key.
meanings.sent4: The backlisted of prohibited items was prominently displayed at the entrance.
meanings.sent5: He referred to the backlisted of restricted websites to ensure internet safety.
